projects.title: Mama John's Pizza
projects.bodyText:
- Full Stack Pizza Delivery Application developed using **React** and **Redux** for front end and State Management.
 -  Employed Redux-Thunk for Asynchronous operations and Stripe API for payment integration.
 - Used Node JS for Runtime environment, Express JS for Backend Routing and Mongo DB for Database.

projects.title: Fun Board
projects.bodyText:
- Implemented **Collaborative Interactive whiteboard** compatible with any pointing device.
 -  Employed **Socket IO** for real time, bi-directional low-latency communication between web clients and servers.
 - Added **sticky notes** and images functionality from scratch with JavaScript.

projects.title: File Zipper
projects.bodyText:
- Implemented **Huffman encoding** algorithm for compression of text files.
 - Achieved compression ratio up-to **6.5** by assigning variable-length codes to input characters.
 - Used **Binary Heap** to assign variable length codes to input characters, based on the frequencies of corresponding characters.

projects.title: Bank Account Management System
projects.bodyText:
- This site enables the customers to perform the basic banking transactions by sitting at their office or at homes through PC or laptop.
 - The system provides the access to the customer to create an account, deposit/withdraw the cash from his account, also to view reports of all accounts present.
 - The customers can access the banks website for viewing their Account details and perform the transactions on account as per their requirements.
